languages.text: "Ты прав, кабалит. Довольно. Взять Эзирраеша, сейчас же!"

traits.locale_text: "Прикуси язык, падаль, или я прикажу вырвать его тебе!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"
languages.original_text: "Ты прав, кабалит. Довольно. Взять Эзирраеша, сейчас же!"

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Kabalite. This is enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Kabalite. This is enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Kabalist. Ich habe genug gehört. Ergreift Aezyrraesh, sofort!"
languages.original_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Kabalist. Ich habe genug gehört. Ergreift Aezyrraesh, sofort!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: “你说得没错，战士。这场对话该结束了，立刻抓住艾泽拉什！”
languages.original_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，战士。这场对话该结束了，立刻抓住艾泽拉什！”
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, Kabalite. J'en ai assez entendu. Emparez-vous d'Aezyrraesh immédiatement ! »
languages.original_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, Kabalite. J'en ai assez entendu. Emparez-vous d'Aezyrraesh immédiatement ! »
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: «Tienes razón, Kabalista. He oído bastante. ¡Apresad a Aezyrraesh ahora mismo!».
languages.original_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"

traits.locale_text: «Tienes razón, Kabalista. He oído bastante. ¡Apresad a Aezyrraesh ahora mismo!».
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: 「その通りだ、カバライト。もう十分聞かせてもらった。今すぐにアエジレシュを捕えろ！」
languages.original_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ、カバライト。もう十分聞かせてもらった。今すぐにアエジレシュを捕えろ！」
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Haklısın Kabalist. Yeterince dinledim. Derhâl Aezyrraesh'i tutuklayın!"
languages.original_text: "You are right, Kabalite. I have heard enough. Seize Aezyrraesh this instant!"

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın Kabalist. Yeterince dinledim. Aezyrraesh'i derhâl esir alın!"
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
